name: Dr. Rajkumar Badminton Academy
description: Offering structured badminton coaching and court facilities in Rajajinagar, this academy serves beginners to intermediate players, with convenient access and essential amenities.
maxBatchSize: Up to 4 players per court booking

contact.address: 1819, Dr Rajkumar Road, Next to Suguna Hospital, 4th N Block, Rajajinagar, Bangalore 560010

highlights: Well-maintained badminton courts with clean amenities
Essential facilities: parking, showers, change rooms, drinking water, first aid
Simple booking policy—max 4 players per court

facilities.name: Indoor Badminton Courts
facilities.description: Standard indoor courts with non-marking surface

facilities.name: Equipment Rental
facilities.description: Rackets and non-marking shoes available to rent (own socks required)

facilities.name: Changing & Shower Facilities
facilities.description: On-site change rooms and shower facilities available

facilities.name: Parking & Basic Amenities
facilities.description: Parking, drinking water, and first-aid facilities on premises
